251083.「それ 本当に咲かせることが できたんだね。\n さっすが <pc>！ ありがと:
That, you really managed to make it bloom. Way
to go <pc>! Thanks.

251084.「いったい なんなん？\n 急に ウチを 連れだしたりなんかして……:
What's going on? Why did you suddenly take us
out of the house?

251086.「ふーん。なるほどねぇ。どうせ あんた\n アサヒに まんまと 乗せられたんやろ:
Hmmm. I see. In any case, you must have been
taken in by Asahi, right? Thanks for coming
all the way down here.

251087.「えへへ。カミハルムイ城の研究室で\n ヨイちゃんが この花を 探していることを:
Heh heh. I heard that Yoi was looking for this flower in the research lab at Kamiharmui Castle. I was wondering if I could be of any
help!

251088.「アサヒも <pc>も\n ほんま アホがつくくらいの お人好しやこと。:
Both Asahi and <pc> are really good-
natured to the point of being idiots.

251089.「まぁ ええわ。\n これ 探してたのは ほんまや。\n ありがたく 頂戴いたし:
Oh, well, that's okay. This is exactly what I
was looking for. Thank you very much.

251090.「ねえねえ。これ あたしも やりたい！\n だって この花に 願いを込めると\n:
Hey, hey. I want to do this too! If you make a
wish on this flower, your wish will come true,
right? Sounds fun!

251091.「好きにしたら ええやん。: You can do whatever you want.

251092.「そうするっ！\n ねぇ <pc>。\n あたしにも 一輪ちょうだい。:
I will! Hey <pc>. Give me a flower,
too.

251094.「これで ばっちりだね！ それでー？\n 想望華に願いを込めてまで 両想いになり:
That's perfect! So? What kind of person does
Yoi want to be with until she makes a wish on
the Yearning Flower?

251096.「はぁ？ なんで ウチに\n 好きな人が おることになってるん？\n ……アホら:
What? Why does it have to be that there's a
person I like? That's stupid.

251097.「えー 違うの？\n てっきり 恋の悩みだと思ったんだけどなぁ。\n 隠さなくて:
Oh, no? I thought it was a love problem. You
don't have to hide it.

251098.「ちゃうわ！ \n ほんま あんたの思考回路 どないなってるん？:
That's not true! What's really going on in
your thought process?

251099.「……本当かなぁ？ まぁ いいや。: I wonder if it's true? Well, never mind.

251100.「あたしね。ヨイちゃんに避けられてると思って\n さみしかったんだよ。それで <:
You know. I was lonely because I thought Yoi
was avoiding me. So I asked <pc> to
help me...

251101.「避けてへん！ \n そんな しょうもない思いちがいで\n <pc>を 付き合わ:
I'm not avoiding you! Please don't make
<pc> go along with you on such a
silly misunderstanding.

251102.「えへへ そっか。\n それなら よかったぁー。: Hehehe, I see. If that's the case, I'm glad.

251103.「それじゃ ヨイちゃんの役にも立てたことだし！\n 帰ろっか。あたしたちの家に。:
Well then, we've done Yoi a big favor! Let's
go home. Let's go back to our house. We want
to thank <pc> too, so please come.

251104.「ほんま ウチのために あんたの手まで\n わずらわせて すんまへんなぁ。\n:
I'm really sorry to have bothered you for our
sake. But thanks to you, I'm saved. Thank you
very much.
